To: bugs@debian.org
Subject: Debconf use is utterly broken
Message-ID: <20080419094700.GA1704@l03.local>
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/signed; micalg=pgp-sha1;
	protocol="application/pgp-signature"; boundary="nFreZHaLTZJo0R7j"
Content-Disposition: inline
User-Agent: Mutt/1.5.17 (2007-11-01)
X-TUD-HRZ-MailScanner: Found to be clean
X-TUD-HRZ-MailScanner-SpamCheck: 
X-MailScanner-From: tautschnig@forsyte.cs.tu-darmstadt.de
Delivered-To: bugs@debian.org
Delivered-To: submit@bugs.debian.org


--nFreZHaLTZJo0R7j
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Disposition: inline

Package: roundcube
Version: 0.1.1-1

Roundcube uses debconf to fetch proper database settings. This is broken in
several ways:
- The questions do not make use of preseeded values. In fact it seems that only
  roundcube/hosts is honored, all others are ignored (including
  roundcube/language)
- If, in contrast to the defaults, mysql over tcp/ip is configured (this may
  apply to other non-defaults as well) via debconf answers entered by the users,
  this is completely ignored, the options never end up in
  /etc/roundcube/debian-db.php

It would be cool if you could fix this, it would make a very nice package a bit
easier to administrate.

Thanks,
Michael


--nFreZHaLTZJo0R7j
Content-Type: application/pgp-signature
Content-Disposition: inline

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.9 (Darwin)

iEYEARECAAYFAkgJv5AACgkQvx6dH3bVKsTs0gCeKAAiCMBY9fzd0MdoXe01DrSk
EYAAoPTlRJ0HG4bNDYOJAkRx6U+HEXWu
=rdwg
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----

--nFreZHaLTZJo0R7j--

Source: roundcube
Source-Version: 0.1.1-2

We believe that the bug you reported is fixed in the latest version of
roundcube, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:

roundcube-core_0.1.1-2_all.deb
  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube-core_0.1.1-2_all.deb
roundcube-mysql_0.1.1-2_all.deb
  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube-mysql_0.1.1-2_all.deb
roundcube-pgsql_0.1.1-2_all.deb
  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube-pgsql_0.1.1-2_all.deb
roundcube-sqlite_0.1.1-2_all.deb
  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube-sqlite_0.1.1-2_all.deb
roundcube_0.1.1-2.diff.gz
  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube_0.1.1-2.diff.gz

  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube_0.1.1-2.dsc
roundcube_0.1.1-2_all.deb
  to pool/main/r/roundcube/roundcube_0.1.1-2_all.deb



A summary of the changes between this version and the previous one is
attached.

Thank you for reporting the bug, which will now be closed.  If you
have further comments please address them to 476803@bugs.debian.org,
and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.

Debian distribution maintenance software
pp.
Vincent Bernat <bernat@luffy.cx> (supplier of updated roundcube package)

believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive
